verses.verse: (A Psalm of David.) The Lord <S%H3068><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> to my Lord: <S%H136><s%> "Sit <S%H3427><s%> at My right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> Until <S%H5704><s%> I make <S%H7896><s%> Thine enemies <S%H340><s%> a footstool <S%H1916><s%> <S%H7272><s%> for Thy feet. <S%H7272><s%>"

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will stretch <S%H7971><s%> forth <S%H7971><s%> Thy strong <S%H5797><s%> scepter <S%H4294><s%> from Zion, <S%H6726><s%> [saying], "Rule <S%H7287><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of Thine enemies. <S%H340><s%>"

Thy people <S%H5971><s%> will volunteer <S%H5071><s%> freely <S%H5071><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of Thy power; <S%H2428><s%> In holy <S%H6944><s%> array, <S%H1926><s%> from the womb <S%H7358><s%> of the dawn, <S%H4891><s%> Thy youth <S%H3208><s%> are to Thee [as] the dew. <S%H2919><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has sworn <S%H7650><s%> and will not change <S%H5162><s%> His mind, <S%H5162><s%> "Thou art a priest <S%H3548><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> According <S%H5921><s%> to the order <S%H1700><s%> of Melchizedek. <S%H4442><s%>"
The Lord <S%H136><s%> is at Thy right <S%H3225><s%> hand; <S%H3225><s%> He will shatter <S%H4272><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of His wrath. <S%H639><s%>

He will judge <S%H1777><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> He will fill <S%H4390><s%> [them] with corpses, <S%H1472><s%> He will shatter <S%H4272><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%> men <S%H7218><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> a broad <S%H7227><s%> country. <S%H776><s%>
He will drink <S%H8354><s%> from the brook <S%H5158><s%> by the wayside; <S%H1870><s%> Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> He will lift <S%H7311><s%> up [His] head. <S%H7218><s%>
